How to play better defense in Madden 18

## Match the right Personnel Wait playcall screen ## User linebacker or safeties Biggest thing you can Take away there main route hold left trigger to strafe, throws press y to intercept ## Base align to hide coverage If expecting pass always base align ## Mobile QBs - SPY a on xbox x on ps4 ## Adjustments Flats - play underneat
